PService.name: EchoCookiesService

policy.name: Policy for service #51281933, EchoCookiesService
policy.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:CookieCredentialSource> <L7p:CookieName stringValue="echocookies"/> </L7p:CookieCredentialSource> <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion> <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://hugh/EchoCookies/EchoCookiesService.asmx"/> <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Rules> </L7p:RequestHeaderRules> <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/> </L7p:RequestParamRules> <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Rules> </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules> </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>

</s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfCookieInfo"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="CookieInfo" nillable="true" type="tns:CookieInfo"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="CookieInfo"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Name" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" message="tns:EchoCookiesHttpGetOut"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:portType name="EchoCookiesServiceHttpPost"> <wsdl:operation name="EchoCookies"> <wsdl:documentation>Lists all cookies
